articles.author: Aditya Maheshwari
articles.title: 'Grudges, Anger, Negativity': Virat Kohli Posts Instagram Story After On-field Spats With LSG Stars - News18
articles.description: Virat Kohli posted a story on Instagram where American actor and stand-up comedian Kevin Hart talked about moving on in life
articles.content: Batting maestro Virat Kohli posted a video of Kevin Hart on his Instagram story where the latter can be seen talking about grudges, anger and negativity in life. Kohli, who is currently participating… [+1922 chars]
